SELECT user_id as userId,u.show_id as showId,u.nickname,u.portrait_address as portraitAddress,max(ranks) ranks, sum( amount ) total,sum( amount ) amountSum
FROM ( SELECT b.id, b.user_id, b.amount, @rownum := @rownum + 1, IF ( @pdept = b.user_id, @rank := @rank + 1, @rank := 1 ) AS ranks, @pdept := b.user_id FROM ( SELECT id, user_id, amount FROM t_funtime_user_account_gold_log WHERE operation_type IN ( 'DDZ_GOLD_OUT', 'DDZ_GOLD_IN' ) AND create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY user_id ) b, ( SELECT @rownum := 0, @pdept := NULL, @rank := 0 ) c ) result INNER JOIN t_funtime_user u ON u.id = result.user_id WHERE ranks <= 10 GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY ransk desc,total desc limit ${counts}
